about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Passionate Web Developer
about.description: I am a developer passionate about creating innovative technological solutions. I specialize in building scalable and efficient applications. My approach combines technical excellence with a strong sense of design, ensuring that each project not only works correctly, but also offers an exceptional user experience.

aboutWebDevelopmentCard.title: Web development
aboutWebDevelopmentCard.description: Experience in frontend and backend, from React to Node.js and databases.

aboutDesignCard.title: UI/UX Design
aboutDesignCard.description: I design intuitive interfaces, focused on usability and visual appeal.

aboutOptCard.title: Optimization
aboutOptCard.description: Improving performance and scalability of applications in production.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of my recent projects. Each one was developed with attention to detail, performance, and user experience.

contact.title: Ready to work together?
contact.description: I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.

404.title: Oh... parece que tenemos un problema
404.description: La página que buscas se perdió en el espacio profundo. Tal vez fue abducida por alienígenas o simplemente no existe en este universo.
